name: Serj Against The Capitalism
description:
"That's the Dark Souls of the Shooting-Donald-Trump-Games!"

-John.

Hi. This is a non-revolutionary, non-aesthetic and maybe non-fun game, but it's made with love. Initially, this was a study project, but thanks to some friends I decided to finish the game (my friends are cool).

I support the popular uprising. God above us.
